name: Fitness Gym Bodybuilding Pump
description:
Are you fond of fitness and bodybuilding?
Do you dream to become the most powerful in the gym?
Download the game and start!
It's a game that can make your fingers tremble with tension carrying out the next approach!

• A wide range of exercises for the maximum effective study of each muscle group!
• Develop strength - increase working weight!
• Choose additives to taste: gainers and energy drinks will help to gain weight even faster!
• Watch the growth of the character in real time!
• Earn points and buy cool items for your pitching!
• Compete with friends: can you become a leader ?!
• Powerful music!
• Interesting and attractive graphics!
• Achievements and points in the leaderboard!

Show us what you are capable of pump the character to the maximum!
Become steeper show results!

Pump your character by different trainings!
Buy supplements and energy drinks in the game!
Try different exercises on the press chest shoulders triceps biceps legs!
Pumping your bodybuilder become a real man!
Bodybuilding workout gym weight training!

Free game!

Always glad to hear your thoughts and feedback write us back!

You can buy an in-game subscription!
